bibl.author: James Redpath
bibl.title: James Redpath to Walt Whitman, 10 March 1863
bibl.orgName: Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: Dear Evangelist: The inclosed note may interest you, and therefore I send it. I wrote to Mr. Emerson to get him to interest some of his friends (he has several rich ones who give away large sums to various good causes) in your Christian Commission Agency. I trust that the result will be what I hoped.

postscript.p: Remember me to Mr. and Mrs. O'C. and Mr. Eldredge.
